snippet: The federal budget cuts known as sequestration are being felt across the country, with some programs coping, some struggling and others closing their doors.
abstract: Federal budget cuts known as sequestration are beginning to be felt across the country, with some programs coping, some struggling and others closing down; although federal lawmakers have delivered last-minute reprieves to some agencies, Washington appears to have reached its limit in offering assistance.
lead_paragraph: The federal budget cuts known as sequestration are being felt across the country, with some programs coping, some struggling and others closing their doors.

headline.seo: Sequester Leads to Creative Stopgap Measures
headline.main: Stories of Struggle and Creativity as Sequestration Cuts Hit Home
headline.print_headline: Stories of Struggle and Creativity As Sequestration Cuts Hit Home

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
